title: Change the Text
description:
Welcome! In this first step, you'll see a working example of our framework. The code is already complete - you just need to change the text from "Hello World" to "Hello CIT84".

**What you need to do:**
- Look at the code below - it's already working!
- Find where it says "Hello World"
- Change it to "Hello CIT84"

**Why this step?**
This is a quick win to get you started! You'll see the framework in action and understand how it works before we start building it from scratch.

**Example:**
Change `'Hello World'` to `'Hello CIT84'`
